data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: You always seem to get angry while you're driving. If ____ would ____ a ____, ____ would ____ driving ____. Don't ____ too ____ time ____ about ____ other ____ are ____. Give up on the idea that you can control other people, and you will find the experience much more peaceful.
data.partBlankContent: You always seem to get angry while you're driving. If y__ would re___ a lit___, y__ would en___ driving mo__. Don't sp___ too mu__ time worr____ about wh__ other dri____ are do___. Give up on the idea that you can control other people, and you will find the experience much more peaceful.
data.fullContent: You always seem to get angry while you're driving. If you would relax a little, you would enjoy driving more. Don't spend too much time worrying about what other drivers are doing. Give up on the idea that you can control other people, and you will find the experience much more peaceful.
data.answer: 你似乎总是在开车的时候生气。如果你放松一点，你会更享受开车的。不要花太多时间担心其他司机在做什么。放弃你可以控制别人的想法，你会发现你开车的经历会更加平静。
